verses.verse: Now [this] was the lot <S%H1486><s%> for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> for he was the first-born of Joseph. <S%H3130><s%> To Machir <S%H4353><s%> the first-born of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> the father of Gilead, <S%H1><s%> was allotted <S%H1568><s%> Gilead <S%H1961><s%> and Bashan, <S%H1568><s%> because <S%H1316><s%> he was a man <S%H3588><s%> of war. <S%H376><s%>

So [the lot] was [made] for the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> according to their families: <S%H4940><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Abiezer <S%H44><s%> and for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Helek <S%H2507><s%> and for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asriel <S%H844><s%> and for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shechem <S%H7928><s%> and for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hepher <S%H2660><s%> and for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shemida; <S%H8061><s%> these <S%H428><s%> [were] the male <S%H2145><s%> [descendants] of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

However, Zelophehad, <S%H6765><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hepher, <S%H2660><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machir, <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> only <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> daughters; <S%H1323><s%> and these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of his daughters: <S%H1323><s%> Mahlah <S%H4244><s%> and Noah, <S%H5270><s%> Hoglah, <S%H2295><s%> Milcah <S%H4435><s%> and Tirzah. <S%H8656><s%>

And they came <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> the leaders, <S%H5387><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "The Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> us an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> our brothers. <S%H251><s%>" So according <S%H413><s%> to the command <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> them an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> their father's brothers. <S%H251><s%>

Thus there fell <S%H5307><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> portions <S%H9112><s%> to Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> besides <S%H905><s%> <S%H4480><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> and Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is beyond <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%>

because <S%H3588><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> received <S%H5157><s%> an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> his sons. <S%H1121><s%> And the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> belonged <S%H1961><s%> to the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> ran <S%H1961><s%> from Asher <S%H836><s%> to Michmethath <S%H4366><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was east <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of Shechem; <S%H7927><s%> then the border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> southward <S%H3225><s%> to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of En-tappuah.

The land <S%H776><s%> of Tappuah <S%H8599><s%> belonged <S%H1961><s%> to Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> but Tappuah <S%H8599><s%> on the border <S%H1366><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> [belonged] to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Kanah, <S%H7071><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%> of the brook <S%H5158><s%> (these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> [belonged] to Ephraim <S%H669><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>), and the border <S%H1366><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> [was] on the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6828><s%> of the brook, <S%H5158><s%> and it ended <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

The south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H5045><s%> [belonged] to Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6828><s%> to Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> and the sea <S%H3220><s%> was their border; <S%H1366><s%> and they reached <S%H6293><s%> to Asher <S%H836><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> and to Issachar <S%H3485><s%> on the east. <S%H4217><s%>

And in Issachar <S%H3485><s%> and in Asher, <S%H836><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> Beth-shean and its towns <S%H1323><s%> and Ibleam <S%H2991><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of En-dor and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Taanach <S%H8590><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Megiddo <S%H4023><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> the third <S%H7969><s%> is Napheth. <S%H5316><s%>

But the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not take <S%H3423><s%> possession <S%H3423><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> because the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> persisted <S%H2974><s%> in living <S%H3427><s%> in that land. <S%H776><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H3588><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> became <S%H2388><s%> strong, <S%H2388><s%> they put <S%H5414><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> to forced <S%H4522><s%> labor, <S%H4522><s%> but they did not drive <S%H3423><s%> them out completely. <S%H3423><s%>

Then the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Why <S%H4069><s%> have you given <S%H5414><s%> me only one <S%H259><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> portion <S%H9112><s%> for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> since I am a numerous <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has thus <S%H3541><s%> far <S%H5704><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%>?"

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "If <S%H518><s%> you are a numerous <S%H7227><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H5927><s%> up to the forest <S%H9194><s%> and clear <S%H1254><s%> a place for yourself there <S%H8033><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%> and of the Rephaim, <S%H7497><s%> since <S%H3588><s%> the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is too narrow <S%H213><s%> for you."

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "The hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> is not enough <S%H4672><s%> for us, and all <S%H3605><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> who live <S%H3427><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> land <S%H776><s%> have chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron, <S%H1270><s%> both those who <S%H834><s%> are in Beth-shean and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and those who <S%H834><s%> are in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Jezreel. <S%H3157><s%>"

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> to Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "You are a numerous <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> and have great <S%H1419><s%> power; <S%H3581><s%> you shall not have <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H259><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> [only,]

but the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> shall be yours. For though it is a forest, <S%H9194><s%> you shall clear <S%H1254><s%> it, and to its farthest <S%H8444><s%> borders <S%H8444><s%> it shall be yours; for you shall drive <S%H3423><s%> out the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> even <S%H3588><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> they have chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%> [and] though <S%H3588><s%> they are strong. <S%H2389><s%> "
